segments.text: I see the woman completely engrossed in her task, a plate in hand, drying it with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, right behind her, two children are preparing to execute their plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It infuriates me that she is oblivious to their antics, the possible disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing over the edge of the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout at her to turn around, to see what’s happening just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is teetering, and every second feels like a ticking clock before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel frustrated; they are breaking the rules without a thought in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR
